name: Tiny-Tasy Town
description: In the game, the player plays a young man who has just acquired his own territory. The land was full of weeds and the monsters. The Player need to collect a variety of resources to build various facilities to enrich their own town. In order to attract all kinds of residents and adventurers to live in the town.
minimum_requirements: Mínimos: Requer um processador e sistema operacional de 64 bits SO: Windows 7+ Processador: Intel i3 Memória: 2 GB de RAM Placa de vídeo: ATI 5770,Nvidia GeForce GTX 460 Armazenamento: 2 GB de espaço disponível
recommended_requirements: Recomendados: Requer um processador e sistema operacional de 64 bits SO: Windows 10 Processador: Intel i7 Memória: 8 GB de RAM Placa de vídeo: Nvidia GeForce GTX1050+ Armazenamento: 2 GB de espaço disponível
